text: I have a client asking if BIMI / VMC is worth it to improve email deliverability - I'm not super familiar with it but from what I can tell, it doesn't necessarily improve email deliverability but rather improves sender trust (since the blue checkmark shows) but correct me if I'm wrong! Is anyone familiar with it? Anyone have any opinion on the difference in open/click rates between emailing before vs after buying it? Thanks!
